textblock: Protecting the individual's privacy on the Internet is crucial to the future of Internet-based business and the move toward a true Internet economy. SAP has created this Privacy Statement to demonstrate its firm commitment to the individual`s right to data protection and privacy. To maximize your privacy, SAP uses a broad definition of personal data that is based on the privacy laws and regulations of the EU, including the General Data Protection Regulation.  This is widely regarded as the strongest legislation to protect the individualâ€™s rights to data protection and privacy, and so SAP considers any information about you or your behavior that can be traced back to you as personal data.
This website, corona-warn.app, does not collect, process, log, use, or store your personal data.

Furthermore and unlike most websites, corona-warn.app does not collect your IP address or other technical information like browser type and version, browser plug-in types or operation systems and platforms. It does detect non-personally identifiable information about your browser requests such as your language preference, but SAP does not store or use this information outside of your single, one-time visit to this website and this information cannot be associated back to you in particular. This website also does not place or use cookies or other similar tracking technologies to collect information about you.
